name: Artisanal fisheries opportunity
description: The opportunity for artisanal and recreational fishing based on the quality of management of the small-scale fishing sector

name: Artisanal fisheries sustainability
description: Score based on the amount of sustainably and unsustainably caught artisanal fisheries, based on B/Bmsy values.

name: Economic need for artisanal fishing
description: Inverse of per capita purchasing power parity (PPP) adjusted gross domestic product (GDP): GDPpcPPP as a proxy for subsistence fishing need

targets: CP pressureCS pressureECO pressureHAB pressureICO pressureNP pressureSPP pressure
name: Ocean acidification
description: Pressure due to increasing ocean acidification, scaled using biological thresholds

targets: CP pressureCS pressureECO pressureHAB pressureLIV pressureLSP pressureMAR pressureNP pressureTR pressure
name: Sea level rise
description: Pressure due to rising mean sea level

targets: CP pressureCS pressureECO pressureHAB pressureICO pressureNP pressureSPP pressure
name: Sea surface temperature
description: Presure due to increasing extreme sea surface temperature events

name: UV radiation
description: Pressure due to increasing frequency of UV anomolies

name: Chemical pollution trend
description: Trends in chemical pollution, based on commercial shipping traffic, ports and harbors, land-based pesticide use (organic pollution), and urban runoff (inorganic pollution) within EEZ

name: Nutrient pollution trend
description: Trends in nutrient pollution, using crop fertilizer and manure consumption as a proxy for nutrient pollution

name: Pathogen pollution trend
description: Trends in percent of population without access to improved sanitation facilities as a proxy for pathogen pollution

name: Plastic trash trends
description: Trends in trash estimated using improperly disposed of plastics

name: Economic status scores
description: Calculated using corrected revenue data for several marine sectors  (data not updated since 2013)

name: Economic trend scores
description: Calculated using change in revenue for several marine sectors  (data not updated since 2013)

name: Coastal protection weights
description: Habitat extent multiplied by habitat protection rank for: coral, mangrove (offshore and inland), saltmarsh, sea ice (shoreline), and seagrass (empty dataframe filled by functions.R in ohi-global)

name: Carbon storage weights
description: Habitat extent multiplied by carbon storage capacity for: mangrove, saltmarsh, and seagrass  (empty dataframe filled by functions.R in ohi-global)

name: Habitat presence/absence
description: List of habitats in each region (empty dataframe filled by functions.R in ohi-global)

name: B/Bmsy estimates
description: The ratio of fish population abundance compared to the abundance required to deliver maximum sustainable yield (RAM and catch-MSY data)

name: Fishery catch data
description: Mean commercial catch for each OHI region (averaged across years)

targets: AO pressureECO pressureFIS pressureHAB pressureICO pressureLIV pressureNP pressureSPP pressure
name: High bycatch due to artisanal fishing
description: Pressure due to artisanal high bycatch fishing identified by discard tonnes and standardized by NPP

targets: ECO pressureFIS pressureHAB pressureLIV pressureNP pressureSPP pressure
name: Low bycatch due to artisanal fishing
description: Pressure due to artisanal low bycatch fishing identified by reported and IUU tonnes and standardized by NPP

targets: AO pressureECO pressureFIS pressureHAB pressureICO pressureLIV pressureSPP pressure
name: High bycatch due to commercial fishing
description: Pressure due to industrial high bycatch fishing identified by discard tonnes and standardized by NPP

targets: AO pressureECO pressureFIS pressureHAB pressureLIV pressureNP pressureSPP pressure
name: Low bycatch due to commercial fishing
description: Pressure due to industrial low bycatch fishing identified by reported and IUU tonnes and standardized by NPP

targets: AO resilienceFIS resilienceHAB resilienceICO resilienceNP resilienceSPP resilience
name: Management of habitat to protect fisheries biodiversity
description: Survey responses by country to the Convention on Biological Diversity (CBD) Third National Report: habitat related questions

targets: AO resilienceFIS resilienceHAB resilienceICO resilienceNP resilienceSPP resilience
name: Minderoo Global Fishing Index
description: Country scale fisheries governance capacity based on policy and objectives, management capacity, information availability and monitoring, level and control of access to fisheries resources, compliance management system, and stakeholder engagement and participation

targets: FIS resilienceHAB resilienceICO resilienceNP resilienceSPP resilience
name: Artisanal fisheries management effectiveness
description: Quality of management of small-scale fishing for artisanal and recreational purposes

name: Coastal protected marine areas (fishing preservation)
description: Protected marine areas within 3nm of coastline (lasting special places goal status score)

targets: FIS resilienceHAB resilienceICO resilienceNP resilienceSPP resilience
name: EEZ protected marine areas (fishing preservation)
description: Protected marine areas within EEZ (lasting special places calculation applied to the entire EEZ)

name: Targeted harvest of cetaceans and marine turtles
description: Targeted harvest of cetaceans and marine turtles

name: Food provision weights
description: Proportion of wild caught fisheries relative to total food production (e.g., fisheries and mariculture)

name: CITES signatories
description: Convention on International Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora (CITES) signatories

name: Management of tourism to preserve biodiversity
description: Survey responses by country to the Convention on Biological Diversity (CBD) Third National Report: tourism related questions

name: Habitat extent of coral
description: Area of coral habitat

name: Habitat condition of coral
description: Current condition of coral habitat relative to historical condition

name: Habitat condition trend of coral
description: Estimated trend in coral condition

name: Habitat extent of mangrove
description: Area of mangrove habitat

name: Habitat condition of mangrove
description: Current condition of mangrove habitat relative to historical condition

name: Habitat condition trend of mangrove
description: Estimated trend in mangrove condition

name: Habitat extent of rocky reef
description: Area of rocky reef habitat

name: Habitat extent of saltmarsh
description: Area of saltmarsh habitat

name: Habitat condition of saltmarsh
description: Current condition of saltmarsh habitat relative to historical condition

name: Habitat condition trend of saltmarsh
description: Estimated trend in saltmarsh condition

name: Habitat extent of kelp
description: Area of kelp habitat

name: Habitat condition of kelp
description: Current condition of kelp habitat relative to historical condition

name: Habitat condition trend of kelp
description: Estimated trend in kelp condition

name: Habitat extent of seagrass
description: Area of seagrass habitat

name: Habitat condition of seagrass
description: Current condition of seagrass habitat relative to historical condition

name: Habitat condition trend of seagrass
description: Estimated trend in seagrass condition

name: Habitat extent of seaice
description: Area of seaice (edge and shoreline) habitat

name: Habitat condition of seaice
description: Current condition of seaice habitat relative to historical condition

name: Habitat condition trend of seaice
description: Estimated trend in seaice condition

name: Habitat extent of tidal flat
description: Area of tidal flat habitat

name: Habitat trend of tidal flat
description: Estimated trend in tidal flat condition

name: Habitat condition of tidal flat
description: Current condition of tidal flat habitat relative to historical condition

name: Habitat extent of softbottom
description: Area of softbottom habitat

name: Habitat condition of softbottom
description: Current condition of softbottom habitat, based on demersal destructive fishing practices (e.g., trawling)

name: Habitat condition trend of softbottom
description: Estimated change in softbottom condition, based on trends in demersal destructive fishing practices (e.g., trawling)

targets: AO resilienceCP resilienceCS resilienceFIS resilienceHAB resilienceICO resilienceLSP resilienceNP resilienceSPP resilience
name: Management of habitat to protect habitat biodiversity
description: Survey responses by country to the Convention on Biological Diversity (CBD) Third National Report: habitat related questions

targets: AO pressureCP pressureCS pressureECO pressureFIS pressureHAB pressureICO pressureLIV pressureLSP pressureNP pressureSPP pressure
name: Intertidal habitat destruction
description: Coastal population density (25 mi from shore)  as a proxy for intertidal habitat destruction

targets: AO resilienceCP resilienceCS resilienceHAB resilienceNP resilience
name: Coastal protected marine areas (habitat preservation)
description: Protected marine areas within 3nm of coastline (lasting special places goal status score)

targets: FIS resilienceHAB resilienceICO resilienceNP resilienceSPP resilience
name: EEZ protected marine areas (habitat preservation)
description: Protected marine areas within EEZ (lasting special places calculation applied to the entire EEZ)

targets: AO pressureCP pressureECO pressureFIS pressureHAB pressureICO pressureLIV pressureLSP pressureNP pressureSPP pressure
name: Subtidal hardbottom habitat destruction
description: Presence of blast fishing as an estimate of subtidal hard bottom habitat destruction

targets: AO pressureECO pressureFIS pressureHAB pressureLIV pressureNP pressureSPP pressure
name: Subtidal soft bottom habitat destruction
description: Pressure on soft-bottom habitats due to demersal destructive commercial fishing practices (e.g., trawling)

name: Coral harvest pressure
description: Pressure on coral due to harvesting as a natural product

name: IUCN extinction risk
description: IUCN extinction risk category for iconic species located within each region

name: Sectors in each region
description: Proportion of jobs within each marine sector

name: Global Competitiveness Index (GCI)
description: Competitiveness in achieving sustained economic prosperity

name: Economic diversity
description: Sector evenness based on Shannon's Diversity Index calculated on the proportion of jobs in each sector as a measure of economic diversity

name: Livelihood status scores
description: Calculated using adjusted job and wage data in several marine sectors  (data not updated since 2013)

name: Livelihood trend scores
description: Calculated using change in adjusted job and wage data in several marine sectors  (data not updated since 2013)

name: Inland coastal protected areas
description: Protected areas located 1 km inland

name: Offshore coastal protected areas
description: Protected areas located 3nm offshore

name: Mariculture harvest
description: Tonnes of mariculture harvest

name: Mariculture sustainability score
description: Mariculture sustainability based on the Monterey Bay Aquarium Seafood Watch Aquaculture Recommendations.

name: Potential tonnes of mariculture harvest
description: Tonnes of mariculture harvest potential for each region based on biological variables and growth performance indices. Taken from Gentry et al. 2017 and adopted for the OHI.

name: Seaweed mariculture sustainability score
description: Seaweed mariculture sustainability based on the Mariculture Sustainability Index (MSI)

name: Fish oil and fish meal score
description: Score based on the amount of sustainably and unsustainably caught forage fish used for fish oil and fish meal. Penalties are assigned for both under harvest and over harvested based on B/Bmsy estimates.

name: Risk of harvest practices for ornamental fish
description: Based on whether ornamental fishing has unsustainable harvest practices (i.e., the intensity of cyanide fishing for ornamental fish, and any harvest of corals since they are CITES protected species). Risk for ornamental fish was set based on assessments of cyanide or dynamite fishing by Reefs at Risk Revisited (www.wri.org/publication/reefs-at-risk-revisited) under the assumption that most ornamental fishes are harvested from coral reefs.

name: Exposure of ornamental fishing to coral and rocky reef habitats
description: The ln-transformed intensity of harvest calculated as tonnes of harvest per km2?of coral and/or rocky reef for ornamentals, relative to the global maxiumum.

name: Relative natural product harvest value
description: Relative importance of three marine commodities (fish oil, seaweeds ornamental fish) within each region determined by finding the relative contribution per a 5 year average of harvest (in USD) divided by the total 5 year average harvest value (in USD) per each commodity within each region.

name: Seaweed natural product harvest
description: Yield in metric tonnes of seaweed

name: Relative ornamental natural product harvest tonnes
description: Tonnes of harvest of ornamentals relative to maximum harvest of the ornamentals within the region observed across years

targets: ECO pressureFIS pressureLIV pressureMAR pressureNP pressureSPP pressure

description: Modeled chemical pollution within EEZ from commercial shipping traffic, ports and harbors, land-based pesticide use (organic pollution), and urban runoff (inorganic pollution)

description: Modeled chemical pollution within 3nm of coastline from commercial shipping traffic, ports and harbors, land-based pesticide use (organic pollution), and urban runoff (inorganic pollution)

name: Nutrient pollution
description: Modeled nutrient pollution within EEZ based on crop fertilizer and manure consumption

name: Pathogen pollution

name: Social Progress Index

name: Region areas based on EEZ boundaries
description: Area of Ocean Health Index regions modified from exclusive economic zones, weights used to calculate global score

name: Inland 1km area
description: Inland area of OHI regions within 1km of shoreline

name: Offshore 3nm area
description: Offshore area of OHI regions within 3nm of shoreline

name: OHI region id
description: Subset of regions that are not deleted or disputed

name: Regions
description: Regions by type (eez, subocean, unclaimed)

name: Nonindigenous species
description: Measure of harmful invasive species

name: Management of nonindigenous species
description: Survey responses by country to the Convention on Biological Diversity (CBD) Third National Report: invasive species related questions

name: Genetic escapes
description: Introduced mariculture species (Mariculture Sustainability Index) as a proxy for genetic escapes

name: Measure of coastal ecological integrity
description: Marine species condition (same calculation and data as the species subgoal status score)  calculated within 3 nm of shoreline as a proxy for ecological integrity

name: Measure of ecological integrity
description: Marine species condition (species subgoal status score) as a proxy for ecological integrity

name: Average species condition
description: Overall measure of species condition based on IUCN status of species within each region

name: Average species condition trend
description: Overall measure of species condition trends based on change in IUCN status of species within each region

name: Weakness of social progress
description: Inverse of Social Progress Index scores

name: Weakness of governance
description: Inverse of World Governance Indicators (WGI) six combined scores

name: Proportion of tourist arrivals to area of coastline
description: Proportion of tourist arrivals to area of coastline

name: Tourism sustainability index
description: Tourism Competitiveness Index (TTCI)

name: Uninhabited regions
description: Regions with low and no number of inhabitants (also identifies Southern Islands)
